channel.title: 317 Delta: Char Glitch
channel.description:
Hey,
To make things short; when I equip items the char top and hair will still be sticking out.. I don't think there is a problem with the legs or boots but the torso and head are glitched. Anyway I can fix this? I've looked through my item file and unsure if the char clothes/hair are in there.
Thank you.
